rtega_mnemonic:
綺綺RSfine thin silk, elegant, beautiful

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 绮)
Pictophonetic: 奇 indicates the sound; 糹 (silk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
綺麗 [ qǐ lì ]: beautiful; enchanting
綺夢 [ qǐ mèng ]: pleasant and romantic dream
綺年 [ qǐ nián ]: young; youthful
綺羅 [ qǐ luó ]: beautiful silk fabrics; person in beautiful silk dress
綺語 [ qǐ yǔ ]: flowery writing; writing concerning love and sex
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 奇 [ qí ] strange, unusual, odd; uncanny, occult
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: This thread is odd, but that's what makes it beautiful. It's a little frayed, it's a little miscolored, but that's what makes it appealing to you.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: If something is a bit odd, it's usually beautiful in its own way, just like this beautiful thread.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You take this beautiful thread and lock it up with a key (き). You want to keep it all to yourself, you want its beauty to be for your eyes only!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: To remember that there's a beautiful thread hidden away, you tie a not-as-beautiful thread to the end of the key.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 斐 (あや、ヒ красивый, полезный), 奇 (くしき、あやしい、キ странный), 依 (よる、イ зависеть, полагаться)
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 亅 (зазубрина), 口 (рот), 大 (большой), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese: qǐ: (графема) шелк с тканым узором, дамаст; красивый, замечательный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the strange (奇) thread (糸) is beautiful
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸", " Odd " sound. The original meaning is silk fabrics with patterns. "Said Wen": "Qi, Wenzhu also. From Shito, strange sound." Duan Yucai's note: "It is said that there are people who have literature." Such as "Huainanzi. "The main skill": "The host is a high platform and a deep pond, carved and carved, twisted articles, 絺綌綌經經緒, treasures playing with beads and jade, the riches are endless, and the people are exhausted." "Han Shu. "Gao Di Ji": "Jia people do not have beautiful clothes and beautiful clothes, they are soldiers, and they ride horses." Yan Shi's ancient note: "Qi, Wenzhuya, that is, today's fine Aya."

" Qi " by extension means gorgeousness and beauty. Such as "Selected Works. Lu Shiheng "Wen Fu": "Poetry comes from sentiment and exquisiteness, fu body and objects are bright." "Book of Later Han Dynasty. Biographies of the Eunuch: "Nanjin, Hebao, Bingwan, and the Collection of Wugu, Yingcheng Collection; the play of 嫱yuan, waiter, singing boy, and dancing girl, full of beautiful rooms."

" Qi " also means exquisite and precious. For example, Li Bai's "Song of Fufeng Heroes" in the Tang Dynasty: "Sculptures of beautiful dishes to meet the guests, Wu Ge, Zhao Wu, fragrant wind blowing." Liuyong of the Northern Song Dynasty "Youth Tour": "Who is the person who loves the phoenix and the phoenix.

" Qi " also means crisscross. Such as "Hou Han Shu. "Ban Biao Biography": "Zhou Lu has a thousand lines, the road is beautiful and wrong." Li Xian's note: "Well, it is staggered." Yuan Zhen of the Tang Dynasty "Xian Zui": "Qi Mo high-rise buildings compete in drunken sleep, the same period of time. pity."

" Qi " also means light color. Such as "Selected Works. Zhang Jingyang's "Seven Lives": "Flowers and stars link, colorful hair." Li Shan's note: "Qi, light and color."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸", " singular " sound. The original meaning is silk fabrics with patterns, and the extension means magnificence and beauty.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「奇」聲。本義是有花紋的絲織品。《說文》：「綺，文繒也。从糸，奇聲。」段玉裁注：「謂繒之有文者也。」如《淮南子．主術》：「人主好高臺深池，雕琢刻鏤，黼黻文章，絺綌綺繡，寶玩珠玉，則賦歛無度，而萬民力竭矣。」《漢書．高帝紀》：「賈人毋得衣錦繡綺縠絺紵罽，操兵，乘騎馬。」顏師古注：「綺，文繒也，即今之細綾也。」

　　「綺」引申表示華麗、美盛。如《文選．陸士衡〈文賦〉》：「詩緣情而綺靡，賦體物而瀏亮。」《後漢書．宦者列傳》：「南金、和寶、冰紈、霧穀之積，盈仞珍藏；嬙媛、侍兒、歌童、舞女之玩，充備綺室。」

　　「綺」亦指精美、珍貴。如唐代李白〈扶風豪士歌〉：「雕盤綺食會眾客，吳歌趙舞香風吹。」北宋柳永〈少年游〉：「綺席闌珊，鳳燈明滅，誰是意中人。」

　　「綺」也表示縱橫交錯。如《後漢書．班彪列傳》：「周廬千列，徼道綺錯。」李賢注：「綺錯，交錯也。」唐代元稹〈羨醉〉：「綺陌高樓競醉眠，共期顦顇不相憐。」

　　「綺」還表示光色。如《文選．張景陽〈七命〉》：「流綺星連，浮綵豔發。」李善注：「綺，光色也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「奇」聲。本義是有花紋的絲織品，引申表示華麗、美盛。

從「 糸 」，「 奇 」聲。本義是有花紋的絲織品。《說文》：「綺，文繒也。从糸，奇聲。」段玉裁注：「謂繒之有文者也。」如《淮南子．主術》：「人主好高臺深池，雕琢刻鏤，黼黻文章，絺綌綺繡，寶玩珠玉，則賦歛無度，而萬民力竭矣。」《漢書．高帝紀》：「賈人毋得衣錦繡綺縠絺紵罽，操兵，乘騎馬。」顏師古注：「綺，文繒也，即今之細綾也。」 「 綺 」引申表示華麗、美盛。如《文選．陸士衡〈文賦〉》：「詩緣情而綺靡，賦體物而瀏亮。」《後漢書．宦者列傳》：「南金、和寶、冰紈、霧穀之積，盈仞珍藏；嬙媛、侍兒、歌童、舞女之玩，充備綺室。」 「 綺 」亦指精美、珍貴。如唐代李白〈扶風豪士歌〉：「雕盤綺食會眾客，吳歌趙舞香風吹。」北宋柳永〈少年游〉：「綺席闌珊，鳳燈明滅，誰是意中人。」 「 綺 」也表示縱橫交錯。如《後漢書．班彪列傳》：「周廬千列，徼道綺錯。」李賢注：「綺錯，交錯也。」唐代元稹〈羨醉〉：「綺陌高樓競醉眠，共期顦顇不相憐。」 「 綺 」還表示光色。如《文選．張景陽〈七命〉》：「流綺星連，浮綵豔發。」李善注：「綺，光色也。」

綺字的基本解释

綺
qǐ
见“绮”。

綺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qǐ］
［《廣韻》墟彼切，上紙，溪。］
“绮1”的繁体字。
(1)有花纹的丝织品。
(2)光彩。
(3)华丽；美盛。

綺字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　綺； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页928第10
【廣韻】墟彼切【集韻】去倚切，?音觭。【說文】文繒也。【釋名】綺，敧也。其文敧邪，不順經緯之縱橫也。【前漢·高帝紀】賈人無得衣錦繡綺縠紵罽。【註】師古曰：綺，文繒，卽今之細綾也。　又【正韻】墟里切，音?。義同。　又姓。【史記·留侯世家】綺里季。　又【集韻】語綺切，音螘。人名。莊子有士成綺。

綺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

暂无。

qǐ
вм. 绮
Radicals: 糸, 奇  (thread, odd)
Meaning Mnemonic
This thread is odd, but that's what makes it beautiful. It's a little frayed, it's a little miscolored, but that's what makes it appealing to you.
If something is a bit odd, it's usually beautiful in its own way, just like this beautiful thread.
Reading Mnemonic
You take this beautiful thread and lock it up with a key (き). You want to keep it all to yourself, you want its beauty to be for your eyes only!
To remember that there's a beautiful thread hidden away, you tie a not-as-beautiful thread to the end of the key.
